summary: The diff shows only documentation/metadata file changes (frontend-file-summaries.txt, BUILD_AND_DRAFT_DEPLOY.md, project_state.json). There is no evidence of actual production deployment actions such as canister upgrades, asset uploads, CI/CD pipeline triggers, or configuration changes that would constitute publishing Draft Version 106 to production. The project_state.json marks the requirement as 'pending', confirming the deployment has not been completed.
